reviewText: I enjoy British sex comedies. They may be school boy smut but that's what good about them. They not vulgar or disgusting. Nothing like seeing the adventures of someone trying hard to get a bit of action only to get into trouble time and time again. I highly recommend these movies to anyone who likes movies from a by gone era in a  Benny Hill type style. They good for a laugh.

I was surprised when the ps4 refused to play the region 2/3 disc. Minus 1 star.  I thought we had left all that region idiosy behind 10 yrs ago. Todays TVs play us standard resolution and euro resolution just fine. Why prevent a legal purchaser from enjoying euro content?? Maybe its just Sony thats not region free. $ince they invented the screwy technology. Wanted to try it upscaled to HD by the magnificent console cpu...read on.
  Loaded region free player on my win 7 and piped it via hdmi to the TV. viola!  It worked but not upscaled.
Also decided to  rip a copy to the hard drive to create a region free vers. of the 2nd disc. I'll try that in the dang ps4. Yeah, sue me , arrest me...I own it!
  Also could have played it in my old region free dvd player from Philippines but still no upscaling...Note: Philippines is not included in any region so all their stuff is region free...weird but awesome!
  Anyway, a great collection of movies. Loved them as a teenager and still love good 'ol Timmy today! The hairdos and mini skirts are wild! Wish some of those would come back in style...I mean, outside of Japan.
  Got a kick out of the coffee stained teeth on all of the cast...these look like real people, not the plastic actors you see these days. Thoroughly loveable!
These were such funny movies!! If you love Benny Hill you'll love this!! My wife got me into these movies and they just crack me up!

These Movies Are Classics And Very Funny,I First Saw These Movies. Back In 1978 On The Old Star Channel Network. And Have Been Looking For Them. Thank You Amazon. Com & Irene Handl. A Very Happy Customer,I Would Recommend This Movie To Anybody Over 18. Because It's Naughty At Times,That's True British Comedy.
One of the greatest early days naughty comedy films which I long to have. The storyline is fantastic for tose who like the likes of Benny Hill and others like it.

this series was bawdy british titillation at it's best- the one liners are a riot and the cheese factor is unsurpassed. this is cheesy in a good way- its a massive excuse to get a lot of women naked  and the story lines are as cheeky as would be expected.
Yes, this is good. I remember seeing this a long time ago & it made me laugh with all the simple sex scenes.
